summary: Syntax file for Altera Quartus TimeQuest (sdc) files
name: altera_sta.vim
description: This is a syntax file for Altera Quartus (version .9.1) static timing files.  This includes Altera's version of sdc, plus Altera's extensions.  A dictionary file is included and will automatically link in if found to provide command completion.
install_details: Nothing special.  Just download and unzip/untar.  There's a README file that shows various ways of hooking it in.
